name: midaz-postman-generation
description: Midaz Postman collection generation and testing scripts

scripts.test:collection:verbose: cd ../.. && newman run postman/MIDAZ.postman_collection.json -e postman/MIDAZ.postman_environment.json --folder "Complete API Workflow" --verbose
scripts.validate:collection: cd ../.. && jq . postman/MIDAZ.postman_collection.json > /dev/null && echo 'Collection JSON is valid'
scripts.validate:environment: cd ../.. && jq . postman/MIDAZ.postman_environment.json > /dev/null && echo 'Environment JSON is valid'
scripts.validate:all: npm run validate:collection && npm run validate:environment

author: Lerian Studio
